EmailTemplate.name: ITM.Send Email 3.Email 3
EmailTemplate.subject: See how other Financial Institutions are using ITM technology
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://ncrevent.webex.com/mw3300/mywebex/default.do?nomenu=true&siteurl=ncrevent&service=6&rnd=0.5837164398039255&main_url=https%3A%2F%2Fncrevent.webex.com%2Fec3300%2Feventcenter%2Fevent%2FeventAction.do%3FtheAction%3Ddetail%26%26%26EMK%3D4832534b00000004138c67e94d6a8af6a77190069926876158f7250cc9b3eab7b737672a013cdc8a%26siteurl%3Dncrevent%26confViewID%3D161323712190090491%26encryptTicket%3DSDJTSwAAAAQAZdtuxOai2W9AVce9M2mxXVbuLgVUzOZs6k4U5M0CsQ2%26]]>NCR’s Interactive Teller Machines are operating in more than 20 countries worldwide and financial institutions in every U.S. state are using them as a way to automate routine branch transactions.
Don’t miss out. See if ITMs are the technology you need to differentiate your brand and be a leader in high-tech, contactless alternatives to in-person banking. <[[https://ncrevent.webex.com/mw3300/mywebex/default.do?nomenu=true&siteurl=ncrevent&service=6&rnd=0.5837164398039255&main_url=https%3A%2F%2Fncrevent.webex.com%2Fec3300%2Feventcenter%2Fevent%2FeventAction.do%3FtheAction%3Ddetail%26%26%26EMK%3D4832534b00000004138c67e94d6a8af6a77190069926876158f7250cc9b3eab7b737672a013cdc8a%26siteurl%3Dncrevent%26confViewID%3D161323712190090491%26encryptTicket%3DSDJTSwAAAAQAZdtuxOai2W9AVce9M2mxXVbuLgVUzOZs6k4U5M0CsQ2%26]]>Especially now, ITMs are providing a competitive advantage for financial institutions. Here are just a few positive experiences from our customers:
Q&A with Associated Credit Union <[[https://www.ncr.com/coronavirus/banking/q-and-a-with-associated-credit-union]]> BankPlus takes tellers remote with ITMs <[[https://www.ncr.com/coronavirus/banking/bankplus-uses-at-home-video-tellers-to-keep-customers-connected]]> Pioneer Credit Union offers extended hours and convenience <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aLYODNZZazE&list=PL493A2508CC7FEF4E&index=15&t=0s]]>
Intrigued? Here’s an easy way to learn more: ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
